# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

We are committed to the security of our users and actively maintain the latest version of the ImageTextReader AI-Powered OCR Browser Extension. Therefore, we only actively support and provide security updates for the **most recent stable release**. 

| Version | Supported          |
|---------|--------------------|
| Latest  | :white_check_mark: |
| < Latest| :x:                |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

We take all security vulnerabilities very seriously. If you discover a security issue in ImageTextReader AI-Powered OCR Browser Extension, please report it promptly via one of the following methods:

1.  **GitHub Issues:** Create a new issue in the repository's [Issues](https://github.com/chirag127/ImageTextReader-AI-Powered-OCR-Browser-Extension/issues) section and prefix the title with `[SECURITY VULNERABILITY]`. Please do not disclose the vulnerability publicly until it has been addressed.
2.  **Email:** Send a detailed report to `security@chirag127.dev` (Note: This is a placeholder; use a real security contact if available).

When reporting a vulnerability, please include as much of the following information as possible:

*   The affected version(s) of the ImageTextReader AI-Powered OCR Browser Extension.
*   A detailed description of the vulnerability.
*   Steps to reproduce the vulnerability.
*   Any relevant information, such as the browser and operating system you were using.
*   A proof-of-concept (PoC) if available.

## Disclosure Timeline

We will acknowledge receipt of your vulnerability report within **48 hours**. We aim to address verified security vulnerabilities and release a fix within **14 days** of acknowledgment. We will keep you informed of our progress throughout the process. Public disclosure will be coordinated with you after a fix has been released.

## Security Best Practices

While we strive to secure the extension, user practices also play a crucial role. We recommend the following:

*   **Keep your Browser Updated:** Ensure you are using the latest stable version of your web browser.
*   **Review Extension Permissions:** Understand the permissions requested by the ImageTextReader AI-Powered OCR Browser Extension and any other extensions you install.
*   **Source Verification:** Only install extensions from trusted sources (e.g., official browser extension stores).

Thank you for helping to keep the ImageTextReader AI-Powered OCR Browser Extension and its users secure.
